verbs.description: [ARG0: A federal judge] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] [ARGM-MNR: harshly] [V: rebuked] [ARG1: Special Counsel Robert Mueller ’s team] [ARGM-TMP: during a hearing for ex - Trump campaign chairman Paul Manafort] – [ARGM-ADV: suggesting they lied about the scope of the investigation , are seeking “ unfettered power ” and are more] interested in bringing down the president .

[ARG0: A federal judge] on Friday harshly rebuked Special Counsel Robert Mueller ’s team during a hearing for ex - Trump campaign chairman Paul Manafort – [V: suggesting] [ARG1: they lied about the scope of the investigation] , are seeking “ unfettered power ” and are more interested in bringing down the president .
